pages.text:
Bites, beers, and
a bit o’ mischief.
Welcome to Packy's Sports Pub & Grill, Lighthouse Point's premier destination for great food, lively entertainment, and an unbeatable sports atmosphere.
Explore Menu
Irish Fare, Sports
& Cheers
Enjoy authentic Irish dishes, cold pints, live music, and wall-to-wall sports at Packy’s—South Florida’s favorite pub for food, fun, and Buffalo Bills game days.
Explore Menu

About
Home
/
About
/
Flavor, Fun & Fire Up the Good Times
Packy's
Sports Pub & Grill
Your Neighborhood Irish Sports Pub in beautiful Lighthouse Point, FL
Since 2010, Packy’s Sports Pub & Grill has been the go-to local hotspot for great food, cold drinks, and unbeatable vibes. We’re proud to be a true neighborhood pub where everyone feels at home — whether you’re here to catch the big game, shoot some pool, throw darts with friends, or just kick back and relax.
With 30 TVs, 2 pool tables, 8 dart boards, and a TouchTunes jukebox, there’s always something happening at Packy’s. We’re also proud to be Broward County’s premier Buffalo Bills Backers Bar — the place to be for every Bills game, surrounded by fans who bring the energy every single week.
We’re open late every night — until 2 AM during the week and 3 AM on Fridays and Saturdays — so the fun doesn’t have to end early. Plus, we keep the weekend vibes alive with live bands every Friday and Saturday night from 8 PM to midnight.
Come for the game, stay for the food, drinks, and friendly faces. At Packy’s, you’re always part of the family.
Live Entertainment and Events
Experience the best of local talent with live music every Friday and Saturday night from 8 PM to midnight. There's never a cover charge, and our smoke-free environment ensures a comfortable experience for all guests. Come early to enjoy our delicious food and drinks before the show starts.
view all the events
Games and Activities
Challenge your friends to a game on one of our two well-maintained pool tables, which are routinely re-felted for optimal play. Join us for free pool every Wednesday from 5 PM to close, and all day on Sundays. Dart enthusiasts will appreciate our extensive selection of complete dart sets available for purchase, featuring over 65 different styles from renowned manufacturers.​
See Our Menu
Sports Viewing
With numerous TVs strategically placed throughout the pub, Packy's is the perfect spot to catch all the live sports action. Whether you're a football fanatic or a soccer supporter, you'll find the game you want to watch in a lively and welcoming environment.
See Our Menu
Fresh Flavors, Every Time
Enjoy meals made with quality ingredients, cooked fresh daily to deliver bold, satisfying flavors you’ll crave again and again.
Stylish Vibes & Live Sounds
Dine in a vibrant atmosphere with modern comfort, great lighting, and live music that sets the mood just right.
A Menu for Every Craving
From pub classics to flavorful surprises, our diverse menu offers something delicious for every appetite, all day, every day.
